availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky grocer. Ohio native. Married Rachel Brookover.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, District 2, p. 108. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 304. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Ninth Congressional District, 1863, Sub District 6. “James C. Brookover,” Find A Grave, April 23, 2014, memorial no. 128439900.
